SQL_STMT_U.val: select top 1 Fiscal_year,START_DT,END_PERIOD_1,END_PERIOD_2,END_PERIOD_3,END_PERIOD_4,END_PERIOD_5,END_PERIOD_6,END_PERIOD_7,END_PERIOD_8,END_PERIOD_9,END_PERIOD_10,END_PERIOD_11,END_PERIOD_12 from gl_calendar where co_id=':1' and START_DT<=':2' order by START_DT desc
select st_period_:4 from gl_period where co_id=':1' and br_id=':2' and fiscal_year=:3
